participant_b.entity_text:
Enterotoxigenic E. coli: It causes watery diarrhea


Enterohemorrhagic E. coli

verbose_text: Enterotoxigenic E. coli : It causes watery diarrhea Enterohemorrhagic E. coli (E. coli 0157-H7) : Bloody diarrhea due to hemorrhagic colitis, caused by Shiga like toxin, also called verotoxin.
evidence:
Enterotoxigenic E. coli: It causes watery diarrhea


Enterohemorrhagic E. coli (E. coli 0157-H7): Bloody diarrhea due to hemorrhagic colitis, caused by Shiga-like toxin
